author: admin
title: Ipreo Completes Launch of Corporate Governance Solution
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 7:28 AM   Ipreo 
NEW YORK, Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Ipreo, a leading global provider of market intelligence and workflow solutions to corporate and financial services professionals, announced the market roll-out of its new Corporate Governance solution, following a highly successful client pilot program over the summer. 
Delivered via Ipreo's industry-leading BD Corporate platform, the Corporate Governance module combines institutional data and analytics with workflow tools that enable better collaboration between the corporate secretary and the investor relations function at public companies, including access to powerful datasets in one central location: -- Institutional voting data -- Investor-level governance decision making profiles -- Governance contacts -- Ownership displays by voting power and history 
In addition to the data, integrated tools allow clients to easily search proposals, link investor targeting efforts to voting behavior, and leverage intuitive CRM functionality to keep the governance and IR teams informed and organized about who is speaking with whom. 
"The response from our clients who have been testing it over the summer has been extremely positive, confirming that there is a real need for better information and connectivity between the various individuals and teams that participate in a company's governance activity," said Agnies Watson, EVP and Managing Director of Global Corporate Applications at Ipreo. "We're very excited to move forward with the full roll-out to the marketplace." 
The new Corporate Governance data and functionality is available now. 
About Ipreo 
Ipreo is a leading global provider of market intelligence, data, and workflow solutions to corporate and capital markets professionals. We offer an extensive suite of investor relations and corporate governance solutions, including cross-asset class ownership data, institutional voting data, investor profiles, investor targeting and a wide breadth of custom analytical services. Ipreo's BD Corporate platform provides integrated data and tools to enable better collaboration between corporate secretary and IR, and gives corporate clients access to the industry's most accurate and up-to-date database of institutional contacts, profiles, ownership and voting data.Ipreo is private-equity held by Blackstone and Goldman Sachs Merchant Banking Division, and has more than 900 employees supporting clients in every major financial center around the world. For more information, please go to www.ipreo.com .
